name.description: Specifies the name of the Application Security Group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Application Security Group.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Application Security Group.

create.description: Used when creating the Application Security Group.

update.description: Used when updating the Application Security Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Application Security Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Application Security Group.
